info.name: Lush Co Backend API
info.description: Complete API collection for Lush Co Backend application

item.name: Authentication

request.description:
Login user (Owner or Receptionist). Returns JWT token on success.

Test Credentials:
- OWNER: ownerlushco@gmail.com / OwnerLush123
- RECEPTIONIST: frontdesk@gmail.com / frontdesk123

response.name: Validation Error

request.description: Get current logged in user. Requires valid JWT token in Authorization header.

response.name: Unauthorized - No Token

item.description: Authentication endpoints for login and user verification

item.name: Admin

request.description: Get all users in the system. Requires admin or chairman role.

response.name: Forbidden - Not Admin

request.description: Get admin dashboard statistics. Requires admin or chairman role.
Delete a user by ID. Requires admin role. Cannot delete your own account.

response.name: Cannot Delete Self

item.name: Staff Management

request.description: Create a new staff member. Requires OWNER role. Phone number must be unique.

response.name: Validation Error
Unauthorized - Not OWNER

request.description: Get all staff members. Accessible by both OWNER and RECEPTIONIST roles.
Update a staff member by ID. Requires OWNER role. Can update name and/or phone number.
Delete a staff member by ID. Requires OWNER role.

item.description:
Staff member management endpoints.

Access Control:
- GET /api/staff - Both OWNER and RECEPTIONIST 笨
- POST /api/staff - OWNER only 笨
- PUT /api/staff/:id - OWNER only 笨
- DELETE /api/staff/:id - OWNER only 笨

item.name: Customer Management

request.description: Get all customers sorted by creation date (newest first). Requires OWNER or RECEPTIONIST role.

request.description:
Create a new customer. Requires OWNER or RECEPTIONIST role.

Required fields:
- name (2-100 characters)
- phoneNumber (valid phone format)

Optional fields:
- email (valid email format)
- address
- notes

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{

  "data": {

item.description:
Customer management endpoints for tracking salon clients.

Access Control:
- GET /api/customers - OWNER and RECEPTIONIST 笨
- GET /api/customers/:id - OWNER and RECEPTIONIST 笨
- POST /api/customers - OWNER and RECEPTIONIST 笨
- PUT /api/customers/:id - OWNER and RECEPTIONIST 笨
- DELETE /api/customers/:id - OWNER only 笨
- GET /api/customers/search - OWNER and RECEPTIONIST 笨

Customer Fields:
- name (required): Customer's full name
- phoneNumber (required): Primary contact number
- email (optional): Email address
- address (optional): Physical address
- notes (optional): Additional notes about the customer
- totalAppointments (auto): Total number of appointments
- totalSpent (auto): Total amount spent
- lastVisit (auto): Date of last appointment

request.description: Get all available service categories with their labels and icons. Public access. Use this endpoint to populate category dropdowns in your frontend.
Get all active services sorted by category and name. Public access.

request.description:
Get all services in a specific category. Services are sorted by popularity (isPopular) then name. Public access.

Available categories:
- HAIR_STYLING
- HAIR_COLORING
- FACIAL
- MASSAGE
- BODY_TREATMENT
- NAIL_CARE
- HAIR_REMOVAL
- MAKEUP
- SKINCARE
- OTHER

request.description:
Create a new service. Requires OWNER role.

Required fields:
- name (2-100 characters)
- category (see available categories)
- duration (15-300 minutes)
- price (>= 0)

Optional fields:
- description
- isPopular (default: false)
- icon (default: 汳)

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Service created successfully",
  "data": {
    "_id": "507f1f77bcf86cd799439014",
    "name": "Deep Tissue Massage",
    "description": "Intense massage targeting muscle tension",
    "category": "MASSAGE",
    "duration": 60,
    "price": 95,
    "isPopular": false,
    "isActive": true,
    "icon": "汳",
    "createdAt": "2025-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
    "updatedAt": "2025-01-01T00:00:00.000Z"
  }
}

response.name: Validation Error
Unauthorized - Not OWNER

request.description: Soft delete a service by setting isActive to false. Requires OWNER role. The service will no longer appear in public listings but remains in the database.

response.name: Service Not Found

description:
Service management endpoints for salon services.

Access Control:
- GET /api/services/categories - Public access 笨
- GET /api/services - Public access 笨
- GET /api/services/:id - Public access 笨
- GET /api/services/category/:category - Public access 笨
- POST /api/services - OWNER only 笨
- PUT /api/services/:id - OWNER only 笨
- DELETE /api/services/:id - OWNER only (soft delete) 笨

Service Categories:
- HAIR_STYLING
- HAIR_COLORING
- BEARD
- BRIDAL
- FACIAL
- MASSAGE
- BODY_TREATMENT
- NAIL_CARE
- HAIR_REMOVAL
- MAKEUP
- SKINCARE
- OTHER
